input_datatypes.name: oc_login_info
input_datatypes.label: Connection details for Red Hat OpenShift Container Platform API endpoint.

input_groups.name: mcmhub
input_groups.label: Red Hat OCP connection details of RHACM enabled IBM CP4MCM

template_input_params.name: bastion_private_key
template_input_params.description: Bastion private key for ssh proxy
template_input_params.label: Bastion private key

template_input_params.name: bastion_password
template_input_params.description: Bastion user password for ssh proxy
template_input_params.label: Bastion user password

template_input_params.name: bastion_host_key
template_input_params.description: Bastion host public key for ssh proxy
template_input_params.label: Bastion host key

template_input_params.name: oc_cli_endpoint
template_input_params.description: URL to download the oc cli from. The file must be a tar or tar.gz file.
template_input_params.label: URL to download the oc cli from

template_input_params.name: ocp_api_endpoint
template_input_params.description: Red Hat OCP API Endpoint URL used in oc login command. Example https://api.<>:<port>.
template_input_params.label: Red Hat OpenShift Container Platform API Endpoint URL

template_input_params.name: ocp_user
template_input_params.description: Username for connecting to the Red Hat OCP using oc login command.
template_input_params.label: Red Hat OpenShift Container Platform User Name

template_input_params.name: ocp_password
template_input_params.description: Password for connecting to the Red Hat OCP using oc login command.
template_input_params.label: Red Hat OpenShift Container Platform User Password

template_input_params.name: ocp_ca_cert
template_input_params.description: OCP certificate authority certificate to be used in oc login command
template_input_params.label: OpenShift Container Platform CA certificate (base64 encoded)

template_input_params.name: ocp_token
template_input_params.description: Token for connecting to the Red Hat OCP using oc login command. Must provide token or user/password.
template_input_params.label: Red Hat OpenShift Container Platform User Token

template_input_params.name: cluster_name
template_input_params.regexdesc: Cluster name can have lower case alphabets, numbers and dash. Must start with lower case alphabet and end with alpha-numeric character. Maximum length is 63 characters.
template_input_params.label: Cluster Name
